title: On My Way
lyrics:
Stop and stare, breathe the air
No one cares what you have to say
Solitude makes me rude
But in time, we all laugh and play
I'm on my way
I'm on my way
I'm on my way
I'm on my way
I'm on my way
I'm on my way
Close your eyes, close your eyes
Don't be shy, don't be shy
In the dark, you can dance and sway
Float up high past the sky
When the night falls, I'll come and stay
I'm on my way
I'm on my way
I'm on my way
I'm on my way
I'm on my way
I'm on my way
Shelter me into the sea
I'll find my way back home, back home
Only give me what my heart can handle
Please, my dear

In the dark, dark, you don't have to be afraid
Oh, in the night, night, you can learn to laugh and play
In the light, light, you can face another day
We'll make it right, right, don't you know I'm on my way
I'm on my way
In the dark, dark you don't have to be afraid
I'm on my way
Oh, in the night, night, you can learn to scream and pray
I'm on my way
I'm on my way
In the light, light, you can face another day
I'm on my way
We'll make it right, right, don't you know I'm on my way
I'm on my way
